title: Sotheby's 'Gold Fur' Bored Ape NFT Auction Will Retest Art World Demand - Decrypt
image_alt: Ethereum Mutant Ape Yacht Club NFT Sotheby's bored ape yacht club Yuga Labs digital art
description: Auction house Sotheby's is set to sell a gold-furred Bored Ape this month, accompanied by other rare NFTs created by Yuga Labs.
